member.name: T:Wexman.Design.AttributeProvider
member.summary: Provides attributes for the Keys or Values in the dictionary.

member.name: M:Wexman.Design.AttributeProvider.GetAttributes(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns a collection of attributes for the specified type.
member.param: The type of the key or value to provide attributes for.
member.returns: An with the attributes for the component.

member.name: T:Wexman.Design.DefaultUsage
member.summary: Used to specify whether the requested default value is to be used as Key or Value of a dictionary entry
member.remarks: If the default value is to be used as Key it may NOT be null (because the Dictionary doesn't allow null as Key)

member.name: F:Wexman.Design.DefaultUsage.Key
member.summary: The requested default value is to be used as Key in the dictionary

member.name: F:Wexman.Design.DefaultUsage.Value
member.summary: The requested default value is to be used as Value in the dictionary

member.name: T:Wexman.Design.DefaultProvider`1
member.summary: Provides default values for the Key or Value properties for new dictionary entries
member.typeparam: The type of the Key or Value

member.name: M:Wexman.Design.DefaultProvider`1.GetDefault(Wexman.Design.DefaultUsage)
member.summary: Returns a default value for the Key or Value properties for new dictionary entries
member.param: Specifies if the desired default value is to be used as Key or Value
member.returns: Returns a value of type T to be used as the default
member.remarks: If the default value is to be used as Key it may NOT be null (because the Dictionary doesn't allow null as Key)

member.name: T:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditor`2
member.summary: A UITypeEditor for editing generic dictionaries in the PropertyGrid.
member.typeparam: The type of the Keys in the dictionary.
The type of the Values in the dictionary.

member.name: M:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditor`2.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the GenericDictionaryEditor class using the specified collection type.
member.param: The type of the collection for this editor to edit.

member.name: M:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditor`2.CreateCollectionForm
member.summary: Creates a new form to display and edit the current collection.
member.returns: A to provide as the user interface for editing the collection.

member.name: M:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditor`2.EditValue(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)
member.summary: Edits the value of the specified object using the specified service provider and context.
member.param: An that can be used to gain additional context information.
A service provider object through which editing services can be obtained.
The object to edit the value of.
member.returns: The new value of the object. If the value of the object has not changed, this should return the same object it was passed.

member.name: M:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditor`2.CreateCollectionItemType
member.summary: Gets the data type that this collection contains.
member.returns: The data type of the items in the collection, or an Object if no Item property can be located on the collection.

member.name: M:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditor`2.CreateInstance(System.Type)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the specified collection item type.
member.param: The type of item to create.
member.returns: A new instance of the specified type.

member.name: M:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditor`2.GetItems(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets an array of objects containing the specified collection.
member.returns: An array containing the collection objects, or an empty object array if the specified collection does not inherit from ICollection.

member.name: M:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditor`2.SetItems(System.Object,System.Object[])
member.summary: Sets the specified array as the items of the collection.
member.param: An array of objects to set as the collection items.
member.returns: The newly created collection object or, otherwise, the collection indicated by the parameter.

member.name: M:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditor`2.GetDisplayText(System.Object)
member.summary: Retrieves the display text for the given list item.
member.param: The list item for which to retrieve display text.

member.name: T:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditorAttribute
member.summary: Provides configuration options for the GenericDictionaryEditor.

member.name: P:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditorAttribute.KeyDefaultProviderType
member.summary: Specifies what type to use as a for the keys in the dictionary.

member.name: P:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditorAttribute.KeyConverterType
member.summary: Specifies what type to use as a converter for the keys in the dictionary.

member.name: P:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditorAttribute.KeyEditorType
member.summary: Specifies what type to use as an editor to change the key of a dictionary entry.

member.name: P:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditorAttribute.KeyAttributeProviderType
member.summary: Specifies what type to use as an for the keys in the dictionary.

member.name: P:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditorAttribute.ValueDefaultProviderType
member.summary: Specifies what type to use as a for the values in the dictionary.

member.name: P:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditorAttribute.ValueConverterType
member.summary: Specifies what type to use as a converter for the values in the dictionary.

member.name: P:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditorAttribute.ValueEditorType
member.summary: Specifies what type to use as an editor to change the value of a dictionary entry.

member.name: P:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditorAttribute.ValueAttributeProviderType
member.summary: Specifies what type to use as for the values in the dictionary.

member.name: P:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditorAttribute.Title
member.summary: The title for the editor window.

member.name: P:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditorAttribute.KeyDisplayName
member.summary: The display name for key property (defaults to "Key")

member.name: P:Wexman.Design.GenericDictionaryEditorAttribute.ValueDisplayName
member.summary: The display name for value property (defaults to "Value")

member.name: T:Wexman.Design.Properties.Resource1
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Wexman.Design.Properties.Resource1.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Wexman.Design.Properties.Resource1.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Wexman.Design.Properties.Resource1.GenericDictionaryEditorTitle
